dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Pig iron is the intermediate product of smelting iron ore with a high-carbon fuel and reductant such as coke, usually with limestone as a flux. It is processed further to produce steel or cast iron. It is characterized by its relatively high carbon content and is typically poured into moulds to provide an ingot structure. Pig iron is notably used in the manufacturing of cast iron, as an element in alloy steel production, and in other metallurgical processes. It is often produced in a blast furnace and may be part of a production mix. Availability locations can include 'at plant' for further processing or 'to consumer' for direct applications.
生铁是通过高碳燃料和还原剂（通常是焦炭）熔炼铁矿石而制得的中间产品，通常使用石灰石作为助熔剂。在进一步加工成钢或铸铁之前，生铁通过高温操作倒入模具中，形成锭状结构。它含有相对较高的碳含量，特别是在生产铸铁、作为合金钢生产的元素以及在其他冶金工艺中有所应用。生铁通常在高炉中生产，并且可能是生产混合料的一部分。其可获得性位置包括'在工厂'（进一步加工）或'向消费者'（直接应用）。
